title: Provide Read Only access to the list used by ContainerEncodingProperties.Subtype Property
body: According to the UWP Supported Codecs Container Subtypes "fMP4" and "MKV" are supported; however, setting Container.Subtype to "fMP4" or "MKV" causes an exception of "Value does not fall within the expected range." so they appear to have not been added to the System.Collections.ListDictionaryInternal used by Windows.Media.MediaProperties.ContainerEncodingProperties.put_Subtype(String value).
